Title: Pearl Encrusted Sweetheart Trumpet Gown

Featured-image: C276-black-white-pearl-encrusted-sweetheart-trumpet-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: A strapless sweetheart gown that is form fitting and flares into a trumpet silhouette. The designed pattern of two toned fabric highlights this gowns fit. The inlayed panels are adorned with sequins and pearls. The floor length skirt falls into a sweeping train.
